name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The "Banned Books Pillar" at the Hong Kong Book Fair

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 22, a large number of netizens made sarcastic comments under a video about the protests in Bangladesh.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 22, in Zhengzhou, a person was electrocuted to death due to heavy rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In recent days, residents of Xipu Street, Pidu District, Chengdu, Sichuan Province have continued to oppose the construction of a sewage treatment plant near their community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Serious bloody warning]
On July 15, in the Fanrong Community of Chaihe Forestry Bureau, Hailin City, Heilongjiang Province,
a seven-year-old child was hacked to death with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens are discussing "People born after 1990 will retire at 65":

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 16, local reports in Shenzhen said that a 73-year-old man at the Municipal People's Hospital needed a lung transplant. For the first time, Shenzhen used a helicopter to transport lungs. The entire process from Guangzhou to Shenzhen took only 33 minutes. Some netizens questioned the patient's identity and the source of the organ.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The "Decision" of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee deleted the expression "public ownership as the main body". Hu Xijin highly praised this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 23 marks the first anniversary of the collapse of the gymnasium of Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of July 23, representatives of 14 Palestinian factions signed the Beijing Declaration in Beijing.
The Beijing dialogue among Palestinian factions made it clear that the PLO is the only legitimate representative of the Palestinian people. They also reached a consensus on the post-war governance of Gaza and the establishment of a temporary national reconciliation government. At the same time, they called for the realization of an independent Palestinian state in accordance with relevant UN resolutions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 23, a traffic policeman was beaten by a driver while checking an electric bike on the streets of Xichang, Sichuan. The driver was then controlled by special police and citizens who arrived.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under a video reporting on the protests in Bangladesh, other netizens reported the comments supporting the protests to the local police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on July 23, in order to help solve local financial difficulties, the central government is studying the introduction of local additional taxes.
In the recently announced decision, one of the core ideas is to increase local independent financial resources, expand local tax sources, and appropriately expand local tax management authority.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 22, Kunming, Yunnan. A signboard fell down from a store along Jinjiang Road, injuring passers-by. The accident injured 10 people, of whom 3 died after being sent to hospital for treatment. The mother of the deceased: her 6-year-old daughter has passed away, and her 4-year-old daughter is still in the ICU. "Ten hours after the incident, no responsible party came to deal with the matter, only two community staff and police officers."
Official report: Learn from this and do a good job and get the facts right.
